name: Pugparade - From the Makers of Growing Pug (Pug Parade)
name_original: Pugparade - From the Makers of Growing Pug (Pug Parade)
description:
PugParade is a new, super fun adventure from the makers of Growing Pug!

Tap Pugs as they run, jump and swim... but avoid touching a specific type of Pug during the round!

PugParade also adjusts to how good you are... it gets harder or easier depending on how well you're doing!

This game will help train your reflexes, mental agility and accuracy. Plus, it's super fun and addictive ;)

Get it now for free!
